sprockets.desc: Industrial strength Sprocket useful for bike gears. Highly efficient gear changes
Smooth gear changes with this aluminum alloy sprocket. Comes in Silver, gold or black
Use this baby to control your rocket ship. Shifts gears into hyperspace without any though
Go into super fast mode quickly and without any energy at all. Comes in gold, blue, or yellow.
Place this sprocket in the right place on your boat and it will float better. We are just not sure where to put it.
Use this special bike cog to do cog things on a bike. Its so useful we don't even list the uses
Space this Cog in a special place on your rocket and you can do amazing things. Comes in Blue only
We are not sure why you would want a cog on a jet but hey we got them. Maybe you can figure out something to do with them.
